converse.line: (What was that?! It looked like one of those things I saw in my weird dream!)
(No one else is freaking out. Am I the only one who can see it? I must be going crazy.)
(Another one! What is wrong with me? It's not like they're bad, but they make me feel strange when I get them.)
(It's like a part of me wants to get more of them. I feel like they open up doors in my mind.)
(Ah! I just had a vision of something strange! People I've never seen before, with angry faces. A darkness covered the world.)
(I feel like I should remember what is going on. I must have had these experiences before.)
(Oh no! It's horrible! Feelings return from a lost time. Such hatred and darkness is overwhelming. Was I there? When? How?)
(What's going on?! I only have one more orb to get. Maybe that will give me an answer.)
(No! What? That doesn't even make sense. Wait... No! It can't be! No!)
(Keeper of the orbs, I will find you! How dare you do this to me?)
I'll be waiting, Emere. You are a mirror that dislikes the night, that is why you complain. Return home.
(I want answers! No more cryptic messages!)
